alert.note: Alert for Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 7:31PM CDT until August 02 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana... Northern Newton County in southeastern Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Toledo Bend Dam, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Toledo Bend Dam, Burkeville, Burr Ferry, Mayflower, Farrsville, and Wiergate. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
